interface.name: netlabel_domtrans_mgmt
interface.summary: Execute netlabel_mgmt in the netlabel_mgmt domain.

interface.name: netlabel_run_mgmt
interface.summary: Execute netlabel_mgmt in the netlabel_mgmt domain, and allow the specified role the netlabel_mgmt domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the netlabel_mgmt domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the netlabel_mgmt domain to use.
